util

Class JavaFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.JavaFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DirExplorer.Filter

    public class JavaFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements DirExplorer.Filter
    An implementation of Filter interface. Limits extraction to java source files only.
    Author:
    Flavio Freitas

    • Method Detail

      • interested

        public boolean interested(int level,
                          java.lang.String path,
                          java.io.File file)
        Description copied from interface: DirExplorer.Filter
        Decides if file should be handled. This method is applied to each file during directory tree traversal.
        Specified by:
        interested in interface DirExplorer.Filter
        Parameters:
        level - File depth in directory tree.
        path - File path.
        file - File to handle (or not).
        Returns:
        True if file should be handled. False if not.
